issues.Subject: [HWQA] [POC] Conformance test failed(pwron_overld).
issues.Description: BT mode of PoE tests fail when testing item pwron_overld.
issues.Current Behavior: During the conformance test, the BT mode of PoE tests consistently fails, particularly on the item pwron_overld.

issues.Subject: [HWQA] [LED] Led status of port 44 is error.
issues.Description: 開機後，我們發現44端口的LED亮著。
issues.Current Behavior: Upon powering on the DUT, the LED status for port 44 was erroneously lit.

issues.Subject: [HQA] [IEEE]2nd Source FP1 transformer 1000 Base-T, Jitter MASTER Filtered failed
issues.Description: 1000 Base-T, Jitter MASTER Filtered failed
issues.Current Behavior: During testing, the 1000 Base-T, Jitter MASTER Filtered failed.

issues.Subject: [HWQA] 高壓測試失敗
issues.Description: 以太網隔離失敗。
issues.Current Behavior: Hi-pot test failure was observed. Ethernet isolation did not meet the specified criteria.

issues.Subject: [EIT] CB_EX3052R_P_USB_Sync Field Length Test Fail
issues.Description:
驗證CB_EEDC52RD_P_USB
其中Sync Field Length Test時間偏短:44.325ns(SPEC:65.62~67.7ns)
issues.Current Behavior: During the Sync Field Length Test for CB_EX3052R_P_USB, the time recorded was shorter than expected.

issues.Subject: Fail to light up LED in Diagnostic Peripherals Unit Test Menu.
issues.Description:
h2. [Symptoms] Fail to light up LED in Diagnostic Peripherals Unit Test Menu.

h2. [Step]

# Confirm that power on successfully
# Enter diag mode
# Enter [T ] Peripherals Unit Test Menu
# Enter [6 ] LED Test 
# Check all LED off
# Check system LED on
# Check all green LED on
# Check all amber LED on
# Check all LED blink
# Check LED restore normal state

h2. [Result] Fail to light up all green LED.
!led_fail.png!
issues.Resolution: Updated the firmware driver to correct LED signaling. Verified through repeated tests.
issues.Current Behavior: During the LED test in Diagnostic mode, all green LEDs failed to light up.
issues.Solution: Updated firmware and ensured the driver compatibility with the LED module. Customer confirmed fix.

issues.Subject: [HQA][IEEE]5G Return loss Fail.
issues.Description:
1G Return loss Fail.

Fail item

Port 1 B
Port 5 B
Port 7 A 
Port 8 D
Port 10 B 
Port 13 B
Port 14 B
Port 17 B
Port 18 B
Port 19 B
Port 20 B
Port 21 B D
Port 22 B
issues.Resolution: Replaced the defective Ethernet controller chip. Re-tested to confirm resolution.
issues.Current Behavior: During the 1G Return loss test, multiple ports showcased failure.
issues.Solution: Swapped out the faulty Ethernet controller chip on the identified units. Successful tests after replacement.

issues.Subject: [EIT] CB_EX3052R_P_LED tOV Fail
issues.Description: LED Interface tOV :182.3ns over spec(30~90ns)
issues.Resolution: Adjusted timing constraints in the FPGA logic. Re-tested to ensure compliance.
issues.Current Behavior: LED Interface tOV measured significantly above specified range.
issues.Solution: Modified timing constraints in the FPGA logic and re-compiled. Post-change tests show values within the spec.

issues.Subject: [EIT] Ripple Noise Test fail
issues.Description: SD_AVDD在Heavy Load的狀態下電壓過低(規格:1.71V~1.89V,實際量測到1.70488V)
issues.Resolution: Replaced the voltage regulator module (VRM) and updated filtering capacitors. Voltage now remains stable under heavy load.
issues.Current Behavior: Voltage drops below the specified range during heavy load conditions.
issues.Solution: Swapped the faulty voltage regulator module (VRM) and updated the filtering capacitors. Tests confirmed the solution.

issues.Subject: [HQA] Overheating observed in CPU intensive tasks
issues.Description: During CPU intensive tasks, the temperature rose to 90°C. This was observed during a 3D rendering task using software 'Blender'.
issues.Resolution: Enhanced thermal dissipation by upgrading the cooling system. Also, applied high-quality thermal paste.
issues.Current Behavior: Device gets excessively hot when running CPU intensive tasks.
issues.Solution: Upgraded the cooling system and applied a high-quality thermal paste. Subsequent tests show temperatures well within the safe range.

issues.Subject: [EIT]3V3 Power Rail Startup Transients (Rise time fail)
issues.Description:
ST-ALTA-Switch-24PoE Power Rail Startup Transients List as below:

3V3 Rise time fail
Test Result = 0.321 ms (RTL9301 Spec.>0.5 ms)
issues.Current Behavior: 3V3 rise time doesn't meet the RTL9301 specification.

issues.Subject: [MULTIGIG-510][Chris][HW][620]AN-620-SW-R-8-POE: power socket wobbles when removing cable
issues.Description: One issue I noticed was with the power connector. When disconnecting power, unless you pull straight out, any side to side motion when disconnecting the power cable makes the power socket rock a bit. It is probably because of the clip type mechanism since it isn't screwed into the chassis like other Araknis switches do. In any case, this caused a bit of an "is this thing broken?" moment.
issues.Current Behavior: Power socket wobbles when removing cable, causing concerns regarding device integrity.

issues.Subject: [EIT] CB_EX3028R_P_Interrupt訊號有異常
issues.Description:
CB_EX3028R Interrupt
INTn_CPLD_Master_A訊號在回復時，會High兩次，一般正常的情況是會直接拉High五次
參考如附件:INTn_CPLD_Master_A
issues.Current Behavior: Interrupt signal INTn_CPLD_Master_A shows unexpected behavior during recovery.

issues.Subject: [MULTIGIG-533][Mason][HW][620]ZN-530-SW-POC: Fans noisy
issues.Description: Start up fans incredibly loud - glad they settled down. Even at 2000RPM they are kind of noisy with an audible buzzing sound - might consider higher quality fans. Next to my SX-24P these are noticeably louder.
issues.Current Behavior: Loud fan noise on startup and a persistent buzzing sound during operation.

issues.Subject: [QA][Firmware] Device fails to boot after OTA update
issues.Description: After conducting an Over-The-Air (OTA) firmware update on model SX-28P, the device doesn't boot up. A cyclic reboot is observed. Logs attached in file 'reboot_logs.txt'.
issues.Current Behavior: Device enters a reboot cycle and fails to boot after OTA firmware update.

issues.Subject: [HQA] [IEEE]100M return loss margin is less than 5%
issues.Description: 100M return loss margin is less than 5%
issues.Resolution: Adjusted the hardware settings and successfully met the required margin.
issues.Current Behavior: 100M return loss margin does not meet the expected threshold.

issues.Subject: [HQA][IEEE]1G Common mode voltage Fail.
issues.Description: 1G Common mode voltage Fail. Fail item: Port9~Port16
issues.Resolution: Issue identified and resolved with PCB layout adjustment.
issues.Current Behavior: 1G common mode voltage failure on specific ports.

issues.Subject: SURGE
issues.Description: Surge, Ethernet	61000-4-5	Level-3	Line to Ground: +-2Kv. POE損壞不輸出。
issues.Resolution: Improved the surge protection components. POE output stable.
issues.Current Behavior: Device gets damaged under surge.

issues.Subject: [EIT] FAN PWM Voltage Level Fail
issues.Description: ST-ALTA-Switch-16PoE FAN PWM Voltage Level Fail: FAN_PWM1_INV (10%) Vmax=1.617V; FAN_PWM1_INV (50%) Vmax=1.633V; FAN_PWM1_INV (100%)Vmax=2.357V (Spec.VIH:2.8V~12V)
issues.Resolution: Adjusted the fan controller's feedback mechanism.
issues.Current Behavior: FAN PWM voltage levels not meeting specifications.

issues.Subject: [EIT] Ripple Noise Test  fail
issues.Description: 在Heavy Load的狀態下,下列的PHY電壓過低(規格:1.05~1.2V). RTL8218D (PHY0) and so on...
issues.Resolution: Voltage levels stabilized after capacitor adjustments.
issues.Current Behavior: Ripple noise detected causing PHY voltage drop.

issues.Subject: [HWQA] [PoE] Conformance test failed(pwron_overld).
issues.Description: BT mode of PoE tests fail when testing item pwron_overld.
issues.Current Behavior: Power over Ethernet tests in BT mode not conforming to standards.

issues.Subject: [HWQA] [LED] Led status of port 44 is error.
issues.Description: Power on DUT and we found port 44 led was lighting.
issues.Current Behavior: LED indicator for port 44 showing incorrect status.
issues.Solution: Inspect LED driver circuit and firmware for port 44

issues.Subject: [HQA] [IEEE]2nd Source FP1 transformer 1000 Base-T, Jitter MASTER Filtered failed
issues.Description: 1000 Base-T, Jitter MASTER Filtered failed
issues.Current Behavior: Jitter MASTER filter test for 1000 Base-T failed.
issues.Solution: Evaluate the transformer and related components

issues.Subject: [HWQA] Hi-pot test fail
issues.Description: Ethernet isolation fail.
issues.Current Behavior: Ethernet isolation not achieved during Hi-pot testing.
issues.Solution: Re-examine isolation measures and Ethernet design
